dashboard.title: FIFA Club World Cup 2025 Trip Hub
dashboard.official_info: Official FIFA Club World Cup 2025 Info

nav.dashboardDescription: View your personalized dashboard with upcoming matches and events
nav.itineraryDescription: Plan and manage your daily schedule during the tournament
nav.venuesDescription: Explore stadiums and locations hosting World Cup matches
nav.teamsDescription: Browse participating teams, players, and match statistics

footer.description: Your ultimate companion for planning and organizing your World Cup experience. Never miss a match, find the best routes, and discover local attractions.

meta.title: World Cup Itinerary - Your Ultimate World Cup Companion
meta.description: Manage your World Cup experience with our itinerary planner

landing.heroTitle: Plan Your Ultimate World Cup Experience
landing.heroSubtitle: Organize your matches, transportation, accommodations, and activities in one place. Never miss a moment of the action.
landing.feature1Description: Keep track of all your matches with detailed information about venues, teams, and kickoff times.
landing.feature2Description: Plan your routes between venues, accommodations, and attractions with real-time transit information.
landing.feature3Description: Discover restaurants, museums, and cultural sites near each venue to make the most of your World Cup journey.
landing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of fans who are using World Cup Itinerary to plan their perfect tournament experience.
